messages.message: @jordy.vlan did you just go through the UI to delete the project? I also have a project spamming a corrupt task to celery-app-tasks, but trying to delete the project stays pending then fails, for I presume the same reason other async tasks are not quickly finishing while the corrupt task is in progress. Did you do anything special to delete your project?

I only went through the UI; another thing which might help is to do
```redis-cli -h redis```
>  flushall
Another is to rebuild your `rabbitmq` image via the crafting interface.
oo right, of these options, is clean rebuild the only one that will clear `rabbitmq` or can the other two do so as well?
